coding_practice.title: Online Election
coding_practice.description:
You are given two integer arrays persons and times. In an election, the ith vote was cast for persons[i] at time times[i].

For each query at a time t, find the person that was leading the election at time t. Votes cast at time t will count towards our query. In the case of a tie, the most recent vote (among tied candidates) wins.

Implement the TopVotedCandidate class:

TopVotedCandidate(int[] persons, int[] times) Initializes the object with the persons and times arrays.
int q(int t) Returns the number of the person that was leading the election at time t according to the mentioned rules.

examples.explanation:
TopVotedCandidate topVotedCandidate = new TopVotedCandidate([0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0], [0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30]);
topVotedCandidate.q(3); // return 0, At time 3, the votes are [0], and 0 is leading.
topVotedCandidate.q(12); // return 1, At time 12, the votes are [0,1,1], and 1 is leading.
topVotedCandidate.q(25); // return 1, At time 25, the votes are [0,1,1,0,0,1], and 1 is leading (as ties go to the most recent vote.)
topVotedCandidate.q(15); // return 0
topVotedCandidate.q(24); // return 0
topVotedCandidate.q(8); // return 1

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= persons.length <= 5000
times.length == persons.length
0 <= persons[i] < persons.length
0 <= times[i] <= 10^9
times is sorted in a strictly increasing order.
times[0] <= t <= 10^9
At most 10^4 calls will be made to q.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 defaultdict 記錄每個候選人的票數。
2. 遍歷 persons，對每個候選人更新票數，並在票數大於或等於當前最大票數時更新 leader。
3. 將每個時刻的 leader 記錄在 self.leaders 中。
4. q(t) 使用二分搜尋找出最後一個小於等於 t 的時間索引 right，返回 self.leaders[right]。這樣可以 O(log n) 查詢任意時間的領先候選人。
